SEARCH
Package io.fluxcapacitor.common

Class SearchUtils

java.lang.Object
io.fluxcapacitor.common.SearchUtils
public class SearchUtils extends Object
Utility class for search-related functionality such as term normalization, path transformation, glob pattern matching, and primitive value extraction.

This class is used extensively during document indexing, querying, and filtering. It also includes utilities for path conversion between dot and slash notation, JSON normalization, and field escaping/unescaping.

    • normalizeJson

      public static byte[] normalizeJson(byte[] data)
      Normalizes all string values in a JSON byte array by stripping accents and lowercasing.

      This is typically used during document indexing to enable consistent full-text search.

      Parameters:
      data - a raw JSON-encoded byte array
      Returns:
      a normalized version of the input data

    • getGlobMatcher

      public static Predicate<String> getGlobMatcher(String pattern)
      Converts a standard POSIX Shell globbing pattern into a regular expression pattern. The result can be used with the standard java.util.regex API to recognize strings which match the glob pattern.

      From ...

      See also, the POSIX Shell language: ...

      Parameters:
      pattern - A glob pattern.
      Returns:
      A regex pattern to recognize the given glob pattern.

      public static List<String> splitInTerms(String query)
      Extracts quoted phrases and standalone terms from a free-form query string.
      Parameters:
      query - the raw search string
      Returns:
      a list of normalized search terms

    • asPrimitive

    • normalizePath

      public static String normalizePath(String queryPath)
      Replaces unescaped dots in field paths with slashes.

      This standardizes paths used in documents (e.g. a.b.c → a/b/c).

    • escapeFieldName

      public static String escapeFieldName(String fieldName)
      Escapes slashes and quotes in field names for safe indexing.
